things.message: Sorry, this button doesn't really do anything (yet). The most I can do is give you a cookie.
Did you come back for more? Cookies aren't cheap you know. That was my last one.
Okay really though, there's nothing left to see here. You're better off scrolling down.

that.message: Yeah, if you're in a rush. If you want the long version, just scroll down.
Okay, if you had time to click this again, you should have time to scroll down.
What, you just want to see if this message will change every time you click it?

hate.message: Sorry for offending your eyes. This feature is still a work in progress, but when it's done, you'll be able to customize this site to better suit your taste.
I can't really help you anymore than that.
